name: 2024 U.S. Election Simulator
description:
The 2024 U.S. Election Simulator puts you in control of an American election night like never before. Customize your very own political candidate and run a realistic campaign that spans across the country. Compete in battleground states in an effort to sway the opinion of voters. Make important policy decisions leading up to the election in an effort to appeal to undecided voters.

Campaign Mode:

The campaign mode allows players to take part in a turn-based campaign where they will have the opportunity to spend their Action Points on various campaign events and media opportunities. Action points can be spent on campaign rallies, television interviews, and campaign advertising. You can also spend money on conducting polls to see how competitive the race is.

Throughout the campaign, you'll earn Policy Points, which can be used to unlock important political policies before the election. Every policy could have an impact on certain swing states, which could have an impact on whether the election is won or lost.

Game Features:

  • Customize your political candidates and launch your campaign across all 50 states!
  • Carefully manage campaign funds throughout the campaign as you make strategic decisions in each state.
  • Track real-time election night results as the votes get tallied. Get real-time simulation updates and live odds as the election plays out right in front of your eyes.

Steam Features:

  • Steam Leaderboards
  • Steam Achievements
